key_commands.description: List pods in the namespace to confirm workloads are running and identify target components.
List Services and Ingress resources to inspect service ports and potential misconfigurations.
Check Endpoints to see actual target IP:port mappings for Services and detect mismatched targetPort.
Review client-side errors indicating connection refused to the post-storage-service, evidencing the impact.
Describe the post-storage-service to confirm the Service targetPort is misconfigured (set to 9999 instead of 9090).
Describe the backing pod to verify the container listens on port 9090, confirming the mismatch with Service targetPort.

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl get configmap post-storage-service -n test-social-network -o yaml")
key_commands.description: Inspect the service configuration to verify expected port (9090) and corroborate the correct targetPort value.
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl get configmap post-storage-service -n test-social-network -o yaml")

key_commands.description: Patch the Service to replace the incorrect targetPort with 9090, directly fixing the routing issue.

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl get endpoints post-storage-service -n test-social-network -o wide")
key_commands.description: Verify that the Service now routes to the correct target port by checking the updated Endpoints.
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl get endpoints post-storage-service -n test-social-network -o wide")
